name: Monkey Splash
description:
IT'S TIME TO SPLASH!

Monkey Splash is an arcade, action platformer best played on Mobile! Tap to fire your Juice Beam and propel your funky Monkey up famous historic landmarks across the world in order to make the ultimate dive! Only the best will make it to the top!

  • Shoot to Ascend: Seamless one-touch control for Mobile devices.
  • Arcade Action: Intense, fast-paced, and accessible 1-minute Levels.
  • Increasing Challenge: Deadly Divers block your path! It will be a perilous climb.
  • Five a Day: A variety of Fruity Power Ups will add flavour to you journey.
  • Slappin' Soundtrack: A different tune for every landmark around the World.
  • Cheeky Monkeys: A zany cast of characters will put a smile on your face!
  • Replayability: Find the hidden Postcards and compete for the best Diving Score!

Developed by:

  • Max Elmore: Producer, Designer, Artist
  • Sam Mortimer: Programmer, Designer
  • Spike Foster: Sound Engineer, Designer
  • Álvaro Moreno: Artist, Designer

Published by Solar Flare London
